Text:
'Lonsman', why have you uploaded the same torrent three times? That is inefficient seeding. You can delete the versions with no seeder/leecher by clicking the red x up right. Please keep only one of them, see
http://thepiratebay.org/user/Lonsman/

Thanks very much for your comment, Kuthumi.
Not quite sure how to delete the others...
My first torrent. Once I transfer some of my very hard to get VHS stuff, there will be loads more..
